meanings.definition: A summary or overview of a text or subject.
meanings.sent1: I always refer to the conspectuses before starting a new book.
meanings.sent2: The conspectuses at the beginning of each chapter help me understand the content better.
meanings.sent3: The conspectuses were like a sneak peek into the story, making me eager to read more.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes scanned the conspectuses of the report, quickly grasping the main points.
meanings.sent5: Creating conspectuses for my essays has improved my study habits.

meanings.definition: A collection of information or data presented in a concise format.
meanings.sent1: The conspectuses of the research findings were neatly organized in a folder.
meanings.sent2: She referred to the conspectuses to find the specific data she needed.
meanings.sent3: The conspectuses of recipes in the cookbook made cooking seem less daunting.
meanings.sent4: The conspectuses of statistics were like puzzle pieces waiting to be put together.
meanings.sent5: The conspectuses of the project were a valuable resource during the presentation.
